post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hello ChilHoan,
Hope you are doing great.
I came across your profile and was interested in speaking to you in regards to an opportunity with one of my clients. I am interested in reviewing your resume and having a conversation to see if we can potentially work together on the positions that I am presently working on. I would appreciate if you would send a word version of your resume and a number to reach you by during the day.

Job Title:   JAVA Developers
Location:    Collegeville, PA
Duration:    6+ months
Bill rate:   D.O.E

In person interviews with 1 day notice.

Job Description:
Java - Oracle (progress a +J2EE +JSP+Struts.
Design and mostly development.Excellent - must   have strong written and verbal skills.

Thanks & Regards,
Anurag Jaiswal
CAT Technology Inc. 377, Route 17 South
Hasbrouck Heights, NJ | Anurag@catamerica.com  
Office:  (201) 255 0319 Ext : 213
Fax: (201) 727 9296
www.catamerica.com
post.title: JAVA Developer Position
